page.title: 12HOLTON AREA NON-FARMING
page.content:
DENBY Storage of newsprint rolls WAREHOUSING and egg boxes using a 3 Men hangar sized 121ft. 231ft.
MILLER Aerial spraying and fert. AERIAL spreading on land using Agcat aircraft. Dealer for 25 reg.men Piper Grumman Aircraft. 6 casual Aircraft repairs.
WICKENBY Flying instruction FLYING CLUB Air charter. 200-300 Aircraft Maintenance members 8 reg. 4 casual
BRITISH RAIL Level crossing, signals and gates.3 shift workers
PUBLIC Maintenance of facilities UTILITIES e.g.roads,sewage,drainage.
